name: CreateTableFromSnapshotRequest
title: Google
Bigtable
Admin
V2
CreateTableFromSnapshotRequest
description:
Request message for Google::Bigtable::Admin::V2::BigtableTableAdmin::CreateTableFromSnapshot

Note: This is a private alpha release of Cloud Bigtable snapshots. This feature is not currently available to most Cloud Bigtable customers. This feature might be changed in backward-incompatible ways and is not recommended for production use. It is not subject to any SLA or deprecation policy.

returns.description:
The unique name of the instance in which to create the table.
Values are of the form +projects/<project>/instances/<instance>+.</instance></project>

The unique name of the instance in which to create the table.
Values are of the form +projects/<project>/instances/<instance>+.</instance></project>

The name by which the new table should be referred to within the parent
instance, e.g., +foobar+ rather than +<parent>/tables/foobar+.</parent>

The name by which the new table should be referred to within the parent
instance, e.g., +foobar+ rather than +<parent>/tables/foobar+.</parent>

The unique name of the snapshot from which to restore the table. The
snapshot and the table must be in the same instance.
Values are of the form
+projects/<project>/instances/<instance>/clusters/<cluster>/snapshots/<snapshot>+.</snapshot></cluster></instance></project>

The unique name of the snapshot from which to restore the table. The
snapshot and the table must be in the same instance.
Values are of the form
+projects/<project>/instances/<instance>/clusters/<cluster>/snapshots/<snapshot>+.</snapshot></cluster></instance></project>
